Episodes.Title: Devil
Episodes.Plot: Janet decides to meet with Tommy after not speaking with him for months since the sudden death of their son. Uncle Teddy refuses to allow anyone to help him get out prison. Tommy is shocked when he accidentally discovers just who his nephew has been sleeping with.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Mike Houston,  Paige Turco,  Olivia Crocicchia,  Terry Serpico

Episodes.Title: Discovery
Episodes.Plot: During a night out, Franco and Tommy meet two women. Tommy is finding himself bribing his daughter Colleen before she tells their mother about his indulgent treatment of her sister Katy. Jerry visits his wife Jeannie in her expensive nursing home and soon goes to Lou for financial help. Meanwhile John Sr. insists on having his 83rd birthday at a restaurant that no one else likes.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Alexa Havins,  Susan Sarandon,  Olivia Crocicchia

Episodes.Title: Torture
Episodes.Plot: Franco begins to fear he's becoming Alicia's boy toy, while Tommy finds a way to end the fling between Damien and his science teacher. The rest of the crew also face their own problems - Lou is becoming real unstable emotionally, the chief has financial problems, and Sean is afraid of Tommy finding out who he's been sleeping with.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Sparks
Episodes.Plot: The crew decide to save some children from a disabled school bus as they go to call in Harlem. However, the soon meet up with an upset Rev. Al Sharpton. Franco finally realizes why Alicia is so interested in him. Mike and his roommate discuss their sexuality. Sean ends up telling Tommy about his feelings for Maggie. Sheila has a proposal for Tommy. Janet wants to talk to him about their settlement, but with no lawyers involved.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Al Sharpton,  Paulina Gerzon,  Susan Sarandon,  Paige Turco,  Tommy  Nelson,  Chris Bowers,  Timothy Adams,  Subhash Mandal,  Sam Breslin Wright,  Marisa Echeverria,  Lauren Potter,  Amy Raudenbush

Episodes.Title: Chlamydia
Episodes.Plot: After Sheila bumps into Johnny's ex-wife, Angie, Tommy seeks her out. Jerry and Rose spend a very romantic evening together, while Mrs. Turbody is in jail for statutory rape. This gives Tommy some relief but also new worries, and Franco loses his daughter, Keela.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Marisa Tomei,  Paige Turco,  Kate Burton,  Chris Bowers,  Timothy Adams,  Antonio Saillant,  Susan Sarandon,  Hassan Johnson,  Lou Martini Jr.

Episodes.Title: Zombies
Episodes.Plot: After a game of street hockey, Sean takes some sleeping pills believing they are painkillers and it has an unwanted consequence. In the meantime, Tommy and Angie decide to go on their fake date that they know will upset Janet. After having a close call, Lou gets a new angle on firefighting from his Uncle Red.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Jarret Sumers,  Michael Townsend Wright,  Taylor Dayne,  Marc Damon Johnson,  Luke Rosen,  Timothy Adams,  Anthony Alessandro,  Marisa Tomei

Episodes.Title: Satisfaction
Episodes.Plot: While Tommy and Johnny have another encounter, Janet and Angie re-establish their acquaintance. Meanwhile, Sheila is unhappy when she sees Tommy and Angie together. Maggie wants to get back together with Sean. Mike hooks up with a woman at a bar, making his roommate, Chris, jealous. Franco finds out about Jerry's second job at the pub, and the money in the no-smoking jar  goes missing.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Brad Lee Wind,  Christopher Wisner,  Lenny Venito,  Antonio Saillant,  Sonny   Vellozzi,  Alison McAtee,  Marjan Neshat,  Amy Raudenbush,  Jesse Gavin,  Poorna Jagannathan,  Marisa Tomei,  Patti D'Arbanville,  C

Episodes.Title: Karate
Episodes.Plot: Lou turns to new-age techniques in his efforts to change his life. Sean and Maggie come to a surprising decision. Tommy and Angie continue to see each other, which quickly leads to an embarrassing scene with Janet.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Sherri Saum,  Jeremy Schwartz,  Soraya Omar,  Tricia Paoluccio,  A. Michael Elian,  Ty Jones,  Matt Mulhern,  Anthony Alessandro,  Todd Carroll,  Timothy Adams

Episodes.Title: Pieces
Episodes.Plot: The crew faces more than accustomed when rescuing a man from his burning apartment; Sean has a request for Maggie's dad; Franco thinks his new girlfriend is hiding something from him; and Tommy realizes that his crew's future together may be in jeopardy.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Cornell Womack,  Sherri Saum,  Alison Bartlett,  Jack Hammel,  Matt Mulhern,  Timothy Adams

Episodes.Title: Retards
Episodes.Plot: Following a meeting with Janet, Tommy has yet another confrontation with Johnny; Teddy's conjugal visits with Ellie prove to be a letdown; and Franco tries to befriend his new girlfriend's mentally challenged brother. Elsewhere, Tommy keeps his vigil at Stack's bedside.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Twilight
Episodes.Plot: John Sr. ends up disappearing after arguing with Tommy about their living conditions. Tommy is none too thrilled with Lou's latest love interest, while Jerry's new woman might  prove to be dangerous for him. Also, Sean and Maggie meet with the priest to discuss their upcoming wedding.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jack Hammel,  William Hill,  Susan Misner,  Manny Perez,  Paul Thornton,  Cornell Womack

Episodes.Title: Hell
Episodes.Plot: Tommy and Janet are brought together once again by another Gavin family tragedy. Jerry ends up not showing up for work. Mike decides it is time to look for some advice about his sexuality. Meanwhile, Maggie has a  surprise for Sean.
Episodes.GuestStars: Phil Esposito,  Stuart  Evered,  Jennifer Ferrin,  Susan Misner,  Marjan Neshat,  Sherri Saum,  Bill Sorice,  Robert Sciglimpaglia,  Manny Perez,  Deanne Bray,  Bill Belichick

Episodes.Title: Beached
Episodes.Plot: Tommy ends up promising Janet that he will help her with the baby, but neglects to tell  her about his future plans with Sheila. Meanwhile, Franco decides to check up on his daughter, Keela.
